title: Video: Loyle Carner – BFG
body:
We’ve been big fans of Loyle Carner since he dropped his debut EP towards the end of last year, and the video for his track ‘BFG’ has only further cemented our appreciation and respect for him.

Focused around the sad passing of his father, ‘BFG’ holds no punches as it grabs at your heart strings and addresses the listener with a relentless, pained focus.

Following on from recent support shows for Atomsphere, Joey Bada$$, and Kate Tempset, we can’t wait to see what Loyle Carner does next.

Focused around the sad passing of his father, ‘BFG’ holds no punches as it grabs at your heart strings \[…\]
